abstract: Anita Wlodarczyk throws hammer record 81.08 meters, becoming first woman to throw beyond 80 meters.
lead_paragraph: Anita Wlodarczyk of Poland bettered her own hammer throw world record at the Kamila Skolimowska Memorial Throws Festival in Cetniewo, Poland.

headline.main: Polish Thrower Is First Woman Past 80 Meters
headline.print_headline: Polish Thrower Is First Woman Past 80 Meters

snippet: Anita Wlodarczyk of Poland bettered her own hammer throw world record at the Kamila Skolimowska Memorial Throws Festival in Cetniewo, Poland.
